# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_BUT_HAS_REACTIONS

## Summary
Set the player invincible to all damage types, but player will react to the damage (ie explosions, fire etc)

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** invincible
